name: 10words
description: Discover new apps and startups in 10 words or less
tagline: Apps and startups in 10 words or less; very active site and email newsletter, worth launching here

name: 500+ places to promote your startup
tagline: Notion template with mostly up to date listings of the same sites here on LPZ

name: 9 Sites
description:
Based in Indonesia. Design looks 20 years old. However it does appear to be posting new content in May 2023. Posts for free with paid option.

Has simple 2 step submission option. It's simple to launch, confirmation page with minimal security to submit. Worth the effort even if nothing comes from it.
tagline: site looks ancient, benefits of launching here is minimal

name: Active Search Results
description: Active Search Results (ASR) is an independent Internet Search Engine using Active Search Results Page Ranking Technology. Last tweet was June 2022. Super simple submission process, but no security. Sends confirmation via email, not sure the value of submitting here. Here's the link they request after submitting;
tagline: ASR is a search engine that isn't named google

name: Addictive Tips
description:
Verifies you are not a robot before showing you the site. Last blog post from March 2023 so someone is updating it.

Has form that allows you to submit 'tips'. You can submit your top but not sure what the value would be.

https://www.addictivetips.com/tip-us/

UPDATE: submitting form generates error, not worth the trouble. The following message was displayed;

"There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later."
tagline: submitting 'tip', aka your launch, generates error

name: Agni
description:
Associated with https://www.angi.com/
Angel List is now Angi

This site is not designed for launching SaaS or mobile app. Skip it.
tagline: More designed for local brick and mortar as well as services such as lawn care, not ideal for launching SaaS or mobile app

name: All Startups
description:
Was being updated as of May 2023. Submit at;
http://www.allstartups.info/Startups/Submit

Simple form for submission. Could be up to 60 days before you are listed. Requires an image at certain dimensions. The image must have resolution either 1024 x 536 px or 2048 x 1072 px. File size should not be greater than 500 KB.

Will launch on it ASAP.
tagline: Focused on startups, up to 60 days wait from submit to listed

name: All Top
description: This was listed but it does not appear to be a legit startup launching site
tagline: Is a news aggregator, not clear how or why to launch here

name: All Top Startups
tagline: has currently suspended free listings, costs $99

name: Alpha Digits
description: Has not posted a new product since 2021
tagline: Has not posted a new product since 2021

name: Alternative To
description: Not sure how to submit, but is active site. Requires creating account and filling out form, then suggesting as an alternative to other apps in same category. Fair amount of work involved including adding screenshots of app as well as logo and social media accounts. This is a no brainer.
tagline: Add your app, suggest as alternative to competitors

name: American Inno
description:
Url is forwarded to https://www.bizjournals.com/inno, probably bought out. Not clear how to submit to this forwarded url. Looks more like a news site.

Based in Richmond, Virginia. Has form where you can submit. Something isn't quite right with this site.
tagline: Forwards to bizjournals.com url - submit form not working

name: American Startups
description:
Appears out of date - last dated post is from 2020, twitter is not active either.

Even submitting your story is very involved, has lots of questions like " What are the top 3 tools that can help American startups find success?"

Not recommended.
tagline: Wordpress news site with share your story link to submit
